title: Getting started with bash
description: Bash (Bourne Again SHell) is one of many shells. A Shell takes commands and covert those calls into system calls used by the Operating System API.

courses.title: Basic bash
courses.description: Brand new to bash, then this for you!  We'll introduce you to Bash and get you familiar with using the command.

courses.title: Managing files with bash
courses.description: How can we create, update and delete files with bash
